amendment.description: Amendment provides that not more than $100 million in Foreign Military Financing funds may be spent for procurement of foreign-made defense articles or services in countries other than for Israel or Egypt.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 76 as printed in the Congressional Record to restore a requirement that permits no more than $100 million in FMF funds be spent on foreign-made defense articles or services, other than for Israel or Egypt.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
